summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 7269, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of that portion of King Street, in the City of Seattle, between First Avenue South and Railroad Avenue, lying to the south of any railway track laid therein, by grading, sidewalking and planking said portion of said street; sidewalks along the southerly margin of said portion of said street to be twelve feet in width; and providing for the payment thereof by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
